channel.title: Experimentation on Torbjørn Bakken Pedersen's home page
channel.description: Recent content in Experimentation on Torbjørn Bakken Pedersen's home page

item.title: video-ocr.py (and chatGPT)
item.description: Over the last year or so, I’ve been dabbling with various scripts to manipulate video, metadata etc. I’ve been running a wide range of experiments, amongst others grading film scans using Python and Jupyter notebooks (with massive help from Paul Duchesne) and trying use the IFIscripts for digital preservation of the scans of my grandparent’s Super8 home movies. I’ve been a light user of FFmpeg for years, but I think finally realised how low the bar for starting to use these tools in more advanced ways actually is.
